draughts.model

Class Board.Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • draughts.model.Board.Square
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Board.ActiveSquare, Board.InactiveSquare
    Enclosing class:
    Board

    public abstract class Board.Square
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Square class. Parent of the ActiveSquare and InactiveSquare classes. row : the row number on the board internal representation.
    col : the column number on the board internal representation.
    active: whether a cell is active (playable) or not.
    color : the color of the square, either BLACK or WHITE.
